summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight deviations from averages.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Consider partial water changes to lower TDS levels closer to the 30-day average.
Monitor temperature closely; ensure it stays within 22-28°C for tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.037 / 7.013 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 328.194 / 307.8 / 337.1 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.662 / 23.56 / 29.62 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
